title: How Can Quantum Coaching Develop Financial Intuition for Trading Strategies?
first_phrase: In the first part of the text, the author explains the swing trading method and the challenges of making operational choices in uncertain markets. In the last 200 tokens, the author introduces the concept of financial intuition and its importance in the unpredictable world of finance. The author argues that the market is governed by chance and cannot be fully understood through deterministic theories. They go on to explain that human intuition is crucial in making profitable trading decisions despite the overwhelming number of market variables. The author notes that successful traders are often attributed with an intuitive acumen. This discussion provides insight into the complex, yet important, role of intuition in the financial realm.
content: In the world of finance or in the realm of economics, every assertion which is capable of being expressed through paradigms of cause and effect can only possess validity at the level of probabilities 114. In the field of human behaviour, and thus in the market, one will always come across expressions which are traced to the fact that such an operational arena encompasses factors that are independent and not susceptible of being repeated. The financial markets are in the last analysis a form of human expression, and it is thus unthinkable that today the identical events which took place yesterday shall be re-enacted. If, therefore, we apply deterministic, i.e. excessively sequential theories, in the arena of finance, we will reach a stalemate sooner or later, or even worse, we will plunge into a loss. There is another fact, however, which is likewise undeniable, namely: No human mind is capable of logically analysing the entire multiplicity of market variables in a sufficiently short time as to enable it to take a decision. In spite if that, there are traders who earn REALLY A LOT on a constant basis. The other people say of them that â€œthey are endowed with an intuitive acumen".
last_phrase: In conclusion, while deterministic theories may reach a stalemate in the arena of finance, traders who possess intuitive acumen are able to earn huge profits on a constant basis. To develop this acumen, we need to open our minds to intuition by surmounting negative emotions, which allows us to naturally reproduce the mental mechanism that governs superior achievers.
